content.raw:
It was running pretty close to real-time. About 3900-4100 seconds total according to the email reports received afterward with a single X2 config 6. That said, it took at least 6 hours for the run to show completed on cloudsim.

```
{
  "sim_time_duration_avg": 3600,
  "sim_time_duration_std_dev": 0,
  "real_time_duration_avg": 3984,
  "real_time_duration_std_dev": 0,
  "model_count_avg": 1,
  "model_count_std_dev": 0
}
```

‌
